titleStmt.title: The history of the worthies of England who for parts and learning have been eminent in the several counties : together with an historical narrative of the native commodities and rarities in each county / endeavoured by Thomas Fuller.
History of the worthies of England
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.
Fuller, John, b. 1640 or 41.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G.W.L. and W.G. for Thomas Williams ...,

notesStmt.note: Dedication and preface by the author's son, John Fuller, who finished the printing of the work, "according to the copy the author left behind him."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Arranged by counties, with the commodities, manufactures, etc., of each, followed by brief biographies of its "worthies".
